tasks.description: Commit .gitmodules, packages/, scripts/, CLAUDE.md, .claude/ rules and tasks. Push to jadecli/jade-monolith on GitHub.

tasks.description: Add jade-monolith entry with staging_branch: pre-main to the ecosystem registry.

tasks.title: Add Claude Code statusline for jade-monolith sessions
tasks.description: Created scripts/statusline.sh and .claude/settings.json. Shows branch, dirty state, and cached ecosystem issue/PR counts.

tasks.title: Update all 14 submodules to latest main
tasks.description: All repos just had pre-main merged to main. Update every submodule ref in packages/ to point at the current main HEAD. Commit the updated .gitmodules refs.

tasks.title: Merge jadecli-roadmap-and-architecture release-please PR #15
tasks.description: Release-please PR for jadecli-roadmap-and-architecture v1.2.0 is open. Merge it, then sync the submodule.

tasks.title: Update TASKS.md with current task state
tasks.description: TASKS.md still reflects the 2026-02-07T05:35Z checkpoint. Update to reflect new tasks (statusline, submodule sync, etc.) and current ecosystem state.

tasks.title: Add ecosystem health check script
tasks.description: Create scripts/health-check.sh that checks: all submodules on main, no open issues/PRs (excluding jadeflow), Docker services reachable, GPU available. Output pass/fail summary. Referenced in CLAUDE.md but not yet implemented.

tasks.title: Add batch submodule update script
tasks.description: Create scripts/update-submodules.sh that pulls latest main for all 14 submodules and commits the updated refs. Supports --dry-run flag. Used for periodic sync.

tasks.title: Add pre-main/main sync script
tasks.description: Create scripts/sync-branches.sh that merges pre-main into main (or vice versa) across all 15 repos via GitHub API. Handles fast-forward and diverged cases. Supports --dry-run.

tasks.title: Add batch release-please merge script
tasks.description: Create scripts/merge-releases.sh that finds and merges all open release-please PRs across the ecosystem. Checks mergeable state first. Supports --dry-run.

tasks.title: Build 100-agent swarm system for Claude Code
tasks.description: Create a 100-agent swarm system inspired by Kimi K2 architecture. Includes: 100 custom agent definitions in .claude/agents/ organized by role (orchestration, research, development, testing, review, DevOps, documentation, data, specialized, communication, debugging), orchestration skills in .claude/skills/, coordination hooks in .claude/hooks/, swarm management scripts, and updated settings.json. Uses Claude Code agent teams, subagents, skills, hooks, and persistent memory features.

tasks.title: Build Agent Task Spec (ATS) â€” standardized task unit with GitHub sync
tasks.description: Implement ATS v0.1.0: TASK.md files with YAML frontmatter as the atomic unit of work, JSON schemas for validation, INDEX.json generation, lock files for agent coordination, progress tracking, GitHub Issues/Projects sync via gh CLI, lifecycle hooks for task start/end automation, and a CLI entrypoint. Builds on the earlier init.sh/progress.jsonl pattern and integrates with the 100-agent swarm system.
